segments.text: I am Mormon , so I go to the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What â€™ s the difference between this and other Churches ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mormons believe that , after the death of Christ and the death of the Apostles 10 , their church Christ founded became corrupt and the authority of Christ on earth was lost to men . In 1830 , a prophet named Joseph Smith was brought up by God to restore the church .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then does that mean the other churches are corrupt ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That means that they all have parts of the original gospel , but not all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you believe that Mormons have all of it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you really go to church ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We gather together to encourage each other , because we have common beliefs . We come together and call it church .
segments.speaker: S2
